Content Creator / Social Media Marketer Job at Buldok Resources Nigeria




        
    

        
        Buldok Resources Nigeria is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator / Social Media Marketer

Job Location: Ajah, Lagos (Onsite)
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Create High quality content for social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Tiktok, etc).
	Experience with social media analytics and advertising platforms (Google analytics, Meta ads manager).
	Knowledge of SEO, Content marketing and influencer marketing is a plus.
	Stay up to date with trends and apply them to campaigns.
	Schedule posts, Monitor engagements, respond to comments /messages or pass on leads.
	Strong organizational, project management and multi tasking skills.


Qualification / Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a HND or BSc degree in Communications, Office Administration, social Media, IT, Computer Science, Marketing and other related field with a minimum of 2 years of proven work experience as a social media marketer.
	Strong copywriting and storytelling skills.
	Must be creative, detail-oriented and trend savvy.
	Ability to work under minimal supervision and meeting target.


Salary


	N100,000 - N120,000 monthly, depending on experience.
	In addition there is monthly performance bonus upon meeting or surpassing target.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: register@peicentre.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
